State v. Watkins No. 208P05 1. Allowed 04/19/05 Stay Dissolved 11/03/05 2. Denied 11/03/05 3. Allowed for remand to COA in light of State v. Jones, 359 N.C. 832 (2005) 5. Allowed 11/03/05

6. Denied 11/03/05

1. AG’s Motion for Temporary Stay (COA04-295)

2. AG’s Petition for Writ of Supersedeas

3. AG’s PDR Under N.C.G.S. § 7A-31

4. Def’s NOA Based Upon a Constitutional Question

5. AG’s Motion to Dismiss Appeal

6. Def’s Conditional PDR Under N.C.G.S. § 7A-31
